data.actual_result: The message isn't highlighted. If you view that same message on Desktop, it is.
data.expected_result: The message should appear highlighted for you, since you are still getting pinged.
data.short_description: When someone tags you using a backslash to display mention ID, the message isn't highlighted
data.steps_to_repro: - Have someone mention you by putting a backslash (e.g `\@Alex1304#0000`) - Have him send the message with this content in chat
